content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: light_gray_wool
inventory=[{"type": "red_mushroom_block", "quantity": 36, "index": 10}, {"type": "bubble_coral", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "melon_slice", "quantity": 5, "index": 20}, {"type": "sea_pickle", "quantity": 24, "index": 21}, {"type": "pink_concrete_powder", "quantity": 63, "index": 24}, {"type": "horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 20, "index": 27}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 43, "index": 28}, {"type": "golden_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 38, "index": 30}, {"type": "bee_nest", "quantity": 14, "index": 32}, {"type": "jungle_fence", "quantity": 55, "index": 33}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 34, "index": 37}, {"type": "lime_concrete_powder", "quantity": 44, "index": 40}, {"type": "dark_oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 10, "index": 43}, {"type": "purple_terracotta", "quantity": 32, "index": 44}, {"type": "azure_bluet", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft an item of type light_gray_wool, I need to first craft an item of type light_gray_dye. I have one azure_bluet in my inventory which can be crafted into light_gray_dye, so I will move it to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: light_gray_wool
inventory=[{"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "azure_bluet", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "red_mushroom_block", "quantity": 36, "index": 10}, {"type": "bubble_coral", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "melon_slice", "quantity": 5, "index": 20}, {"type": "sea_pickle", "quantity": 24, "index": 21}, {"type": "pink_concrete_powder", "quantity": 63, "index": 24}, {"type": "horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 20, "index": 27}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 43, "index": 28}, {"type": "golden_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 38, "index": 30}, {"type": "bee_nest", "quantity": 14, "index": 32}, {"type": "jungle_fence", "quantity": 55, "index": 33}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 34, "index": 37}, {"type": "lime_concrete_powder", "quantity": 44, "index": 40}, {"type": "dark_oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 10, "index": 43}, {"type": "purple_terracotta", "quantity": 32, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I have crafted the light_gray_dye, I will move it to my inventory. I will choose slot 11 since it is the lowest numbered empty slot.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: light_gray_wool
inventory=[{"type": "red_mushroom_block", "quantity": 36, "index": 10}, {"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "bubble_coral", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "melon_slice", "quantity": 5, "index": 20}, {"type": "sea_pickle", "quantity": 24, "index": 21}, {"type": "pink_concrete_powder", "quantity": 63, "index": 24}, {"type": "horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 20, "index": 27}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 43, "index": 28}, {"type": "golden_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 38, "index": 30}, {"type": "bee_nest", "quantity": 14, "index": 32}, {"type": "jungle_fence", "quantity": 55, "index": 33}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 34, "index": 37}, {"type": "lime_concrete_powder", "quantity": 44, "index": 40}, {"type": "dark_oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 10, "index": 43}, {"type": "purple_terracotta", "quantity": 32, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft light_gray_wool, I need to place 1 light_gray_dye and 1 white_wool side by side in the crafting table. Therefore, I will first move the light_gray_dye from slot 11 into the crafting table at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: light_gray_wool
inventory=[{"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "red_mushroom_block", "quantity": 36, "index": 10}, {"type": "bubble_coral", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "melon_slice", "quantity": 5, "index": 20}, {"type": "sea_pickle", "quantity": 24, "index": 21}, {"type": "pink_concrete_powder", "quantity": 63, "index": 24}, {"type": "horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 20, "index": 27}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 43, "index": 28}, {"type": "golden_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 38, "index": 30}, {"type": "bee_nest", "quantity": 14, "index": 32}, {"type": "jungle_fence", "quantity": 55, "index": 33}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 34, "index": 37}, {"type": "lime_concrete_powder", "quantity": 44, "index": 40}, {"type": "dark_oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 10, "index": 43}, {"type": "purple_terracotta", "quantity": 32, "index": 44}]
thought: Next, I need to move the white_wool from slot 17 into the crafting table at slot 2, which is adjacent to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: light_gray_wool
inventory=[{"type": "light_gray_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "red_mushroom_block", "quantity": 36, "index": 10}, {"type": "bubble_coral", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "melon_slice", "quantity": 5, "index": 20}, {"type": "sea_pickle", "quantity": 24, "index": 21}, {"type": "pink_concrete_powder", "quantity": 63, "index": 24}, {"type": "horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 20, "index": 27}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 43, "index": 28}, {"type": "golden_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 38, "index": 30}, {"type": "bee_nest", "quantity": 14, "index": 32}, {"type": "jungle_fence", "quantity": 55, "index": 33}, {"type": "andesite", "quantity": 34, "index": 37}, {"type": "lime_concrete_powder", "quantity": 44, "index": 40}, {"type": "dark_oak_boat", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 10, "index": 43}, {"type": "purple_terracotta", "quantity": 32, "index": 44}]
thought: Finally, I can craft the light_gray_wool by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
